DOC.brief_summary: This study compare effectiveness three drug ( Passiflora incarnata , Erythrina mulungum , Midazolam ) control anxiety patient undergoing bilateral extraction asymptomatic , impacted mandibular third molar .
DOC.brief_title: Three Anxiolytic Drugs Used Third Molar Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: In research , characterize randomize , double-blind , parallel study , 200 healthy volunteer patient age 18 old distribute 4 group ( n=50 ) follow : Group I - 500mg Erythrina mulungu ; Group II - placebo ; Group III ; 100 mg Passiflora incarnata ; Group IV - 15 mg midazolam . All treatment administer p.o . 1 hour randomly prior surgical procedure . The level anxiety assess questionnaire physical parameter , blood pressure , heart rate oxygen concentration three period : baseline , right surgical procedure 7 day . Data collect , tabulate analyzed following statistical test : chi-square , t-test , ANOVA Tukey test , Friedman , Fisher 's exact test significance level 5 % .
